body:
Adding new package express. Had to get slightly dirty trying to hack around the `$` in `CMakeLists.txt`.
 
Error present when compiling with gcc 6.3.0 and 7.1.0 as follows:
```
error: no matching function for call to ‘Target::cached_effective_length(const boost::shared_ptr<BiasBoss>&) const’
```
added appropriate versioned `conflicts()` spec in `package.py` to accommodate for this.
title: express: new package
